actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power Resources.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water and Power Resources

official_title: A bill to prohibit certain discharges of waste waters into the Pacific Ocean between Morro Bay and San Francisco Bay, California, including the bays and their environs, the San Joaquin River and the Sacramento-San Joaquin Delta and Estuary.
subjects: Waste disposal in rivers, lakes, etc.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of the Interior from discharging wastewaters from the Central Valley Project into the Pacific Ocean between Morro Bay and San Francisco Bay, California, including the bays and their environs, the San Joaquin River, and the Sacramento-San Joaquin Delta and Estuary.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit certain discharges of waste waters into the Pacific Ocean between Morro Bay and San Francisco Bay, California, including the bays and their environs, the San Joaquin River and the Sacramento-San Joaquin Delta and Estuary.
